title: Enroll Patient in Care Management
description: A patient identified as high-risk needs to be enrolled in a care management program.

tasks.description: Identify the patient who has been recommended for care management.
tasks.expected_outcome: Care manager finds the patient in their work queue.

tasks.description: Contact the patient to explain the program and obtain their consent to enroll.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patient agrees to participate in the program.

tasks.description: Update the patient's status in the system to 'Enrolled in Care Management' and assign them a primary care manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patient is successfully enrolled, and their care can be actively managed.
